title: Matchsafe, "Dog in Feathered Hat and Ruffled Collar", late 19th century
markings: Lion passant and other illegible marks.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: In the shape of a seated dog with ruffled collar and feathered hat, inscribed on band on reverse side of hat "Rd.1465"(?- illegible impression). Lid opens at bottom, hinge on side above tail. Striker recessed in bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Dog in Feathered Hat and Ruffled Collar", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Silver. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1982-23-1324.
